title: Master Of Immortal Cultivation: Start Practicing With Your Mind
alternative_title: 修仙大佬：从脑补开始修炼 ; Xiuxian Da Lao: Cong Nao Bu Kaishi Xiulian ; Immortal Cultivator Cultivating From Imagination
status: 修仙大佬：从脑补开始修炼 ; Xiuxian Da Lao: Cong Nao Bu Kaishi Xiulian ; Immortal Cultivator Cultivating From Imagination
description:
Description :
        Qin Feng, who transmigrated into a cultivation world with divine-level comprehension talent, remained unaware of his own strength and believed himself to be weak. After all, in order to keep him, the entire sect pretended to be superior and created an illusion of his incompetence. So, what kind of storm will unfold in this world when a top-tier individual with low self-esteem but exceptional comprehension talent is present!
